titleStmt.title: Some reflections on His Majesty's proclamation of the 12th of February 1686/7 for a toleration in Scotland, together with the said proclamation
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II). By the King a proclamation.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gilbert Burnet. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
"By the King. A proclamation...the twelfth day of Febr. 1686/7...", p. 6-8, signed Melfort.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
